items.title: ‘How to Train Your Dragon’ tops box office again, while ‘Elio’ is a flop for Pixar
items.description: ‘How to Train Your Dragon’ tops box office again, while ‘Elio’ is a flop for Pixar

items.title: Nvidia: How the chipmaker evolved from a gaming startup to an AI giant
items.description: Here’s a look at Nvidia’s path to where it is today, from creating hardware for the gaming industry to designing the chips that power AI.
